text: mago'amo'za Zanoa rankuma'ene Adulamu rankuma'ene tvaoma'arema megagi'nea ne'onse kumatamine, Lakisi rankuma'ene tva'oma'arema megagi'nea moparamine, Azeka rankuma'ene tva'oma'are'ma megagi'nea ne'onse kumatamimpina mani vagare'naze. Hagi ana hute'za Berseba rankumateti agafa hu'za manite'za vuvava hu'za Hinomu agupore uhanati'naze.
